About.title: About
About.description: This is a minimalistic mock weather app built with <linkToNext>Next.js</linkToNext>.
About.liveDuration: We've been live for {duration, number, ::precision-integer} seconds.
About.text1: The Association of Entrepreneurs of GBAO (hereinafter referred to as ‚ÄúAE of GBAO‚Äù) was created in 2023 with the aim of strengthening the economic opportunities of entrepreneurs. It also strives to provide its members with financial education and basic knowledge of entrepreneurship, as well as access to financial and economic resources for business development in the region.
About.text2: The first event organized by ‚ÄúAE of GBAO‚Äù was the Pamir Investment Forum in August 2023. This event brought together local and foreign investors. The forum was organized in cooperation with the local executive authority of GBAO with the financial support of international donor organizations operating in the territory of the Republic of Tajikistan.
About.text3: The topics of the forum included the development of three main potential sectors of the GBAO economy. Areas of possible investment included the mining sector, the development of the tourism industry in the region, the creation of industrial enterprises and the processing of local agricultural products. Entrepreneurs presented more than 34 business plans aimed at developing these sectors.
About.text4: ‚ÄúAE of GBAO‚Äù has the right to carry out activities requiring special permission or license only after receiving the appropriate permit. The permit expires upon expiration.
